channel.title: Fail on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Fail on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Too much git cleaning
item.description: Learn how to handle git mistakes and recover lost work with simple solutions. Explore commands like git clean and git reset, and discover how to undo mistakes using ctrl + z in RStudio. Gain confidence in your git journey with tips from experienced developers and helpful resources.
